lead_paragraph: Seeking to mobilize a global front against anti-gay violence and discrimination, Vice President Joe Biden declared Tuesday that protecting gay rights is a defining mark of a civilized nation and must trump national cultures and social traditions.

headline.main: Biden: Gay Rights Take Precedence Over Culture
headline.print_headline: Biden: Gay Rights Take Precedence Over Culture

snippet: Seeking to mobilize a global front against anti-gay violence and discrimination, Vice President Joe Biden declared Tuesday that protecting gay rights is a defining mark of a civilized nation and must trump national cultures and social traditions....
